website_summaries.verdict: Though these boots are fashionable, they aren't designed for heavy rainy conditions.
pros: Fashionable boots with removable cushioned insole
cons: Cheaper material than the other boots we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on this rain boot, I'm SO glad I went with a size 5. I normally wear a size 5.5 or 6, so I sized down. I have just enough room to wear thicker socks if I wanted. It hits right below my knees. I like the bottom because it's super gummy and made well. Love the color. Exactly what I wanted and what I saw in photos. Couldn't be more pleased. Ready for weather in Portland!
customer_reviews.author: ORclimber

customer_reviews.title: I never thought I'd long for rainy days, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd long for rainy days, but these boots have done that to me! As mom of two school-age children and a toddler, there's no longer any such thing as "dashing out the door and into the car." School drop-offs and pickups are often the soggiest adventures of my suburban life, and my only regret is that I chose a classic Navy rather than a whimsical floral. Live a little!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Cute.... Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Loved them when I got them ,wore them once and the buckle on one of them has already broke off
customer_reviews.author: kl26

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic!!! Soft, flexible and high quality rubber makes on/off easy! Fits right below the knee (I am 5'5"). The adjustable calf is fantastic and the buckle is sturdy and super cute! Totally worth it and I can't wait to order my second pair! I usually wear an 8.5 and ordered a 9 which will comfortably fit with thick warm winter socks, could have also fit in an 8 but needed the room for outdoor winter conditions. Beautiful muck boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but maybe for you (if you have a skinny foot)
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy full return. Good quality. Cons: When I held this too my foot, it looks like it would have fit nicely HOWEVER the ankle was so tight, I couldn't get my foot all the way into the boot. This boot could benefit from a wider opening OR a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Prime

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: The detailing is spot on. It allows for thick socks which is what I was hoping for (going to use them in the snow). The calf buckle can be adjusted but it doesn't really make the shaft any wider or narrower. I measured the shaft opening and it's 16", perfect enough for me to comfortably wear jeans or leggings with. It's such a good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered two different sizes and both have run ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two different sizes and both have run way to big. I have given up at this point. Both times they came in already really scuffed up
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a bit wider in the calf area, otherwise they are awesome in high weeds and wet grounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ben There

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. However, I do have wider calves and they are a little tight. They seem to loosen a bit as I wear them so maybe they'll just take a little breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Mkgeret

customer_reviews.title: love this, Im a size 6-8 but my calfs ...
customer_reviews.text: love this, Im a size 6-8 but my calfs are bigger. When i put them on, they are like vacuum sealed. prety tough to get off. haha. If you have very large calfs, these wont fit
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: But I still feel comfortable giving a five star review
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these yet. But I still feel comfortable giving a five star review. These are so very well made. And they are sooooooooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: Rocquael

customer_reviews.title: Great Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, the calf was generous (I have 16" calves) and they fit and have room for big fluffy socks or skinny jeans/leggings. AND that was with the buckle set to factory default. It looks like they can be expanded a bit. Why had I not ordered rain boots before! We are getting chickens and I needed something to go into the garden in the wet and slushy Fall/Winter months! I hope to be able to do driveway shoveling also when we get HUGE snow drifts. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HG Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Adorable boots
customer_reviews.text: Adorable Rain Boots - cute and stylish. They fit as expected and worked well for mucking around in the damp fall weather.
customer_reviews.author: EQuinnB

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, but didn't fit as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute but huge in the ankles, the calves were slightly tight as well which made the boot seem disproportionate on me. Make sure to check the measurements!
customer_reviews.author: ariesheiress

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, calf fit smaller than expected, had to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy another pair of Joules rain boots, as my first pair were gifted to me and they didn't impress me much (this was over a year ago) ... But I really wanted a navy pair, so I took a chance and wow!! I am so happy that I did! They have improved the quality tremendously! I love them more than any of my Hunter boots at this point. I've had them for over a week and they are so much lighter without sacrificing solid quality, the profile of the boot is much more flattering and the detail makes them really charming. My husband even thinks they're cute!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 10 and found they were too big ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 10 and found they were too big. The 9 was too small. Really need to make these in 1/2 sizes. Had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered these boots in a 9 and they felt like a size 10
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in a 9 and they felt like a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit funny, and only worn once so far because of it. Nice quality and color though.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rain Boot
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors - Not as thick & sturdy as the bogs I'm used to wearing, but again, love the colors & height.
customer_reviews.author: EB Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not good for average-wide calves
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit wide calves! I don't consider myself to have abnormally wide calves either but I guess I thought wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were to tight around the calf. Is there any way to stretch them?
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boots have a film on them which is problematic.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: ... noticeable scuffs but fits well and the boots look nice
customer_reviews.text: Extremely noticeable scuffs but fits well and the boots look nice otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Claire Ap

customer_reviews.title: They were on perfect condition, the only problem was theye were too ...
customer_reviews.text: They were on perfect condition, the only problem was theye were too big, I orderd size 9 and they fited like a 10. I couldn't even walk.
customer_reviews.author: Adria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are good to wear in the rain and the snow....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size down for the best fit.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 in these and returned them because they were too big. Order a half size down for the best fit.
customer_reviews.author: HelenC

customer_reviews.title: Great looking! Feel wonderful on
customer_reviews.text: Great looking! Feel wonderful on. Now just waiting for a rainy day so I may wear. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sukie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to get some insoles now they fit perfect they look way better then hunter boots
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, lightweight but durable (I'm in a barn all day). Good tall height. Based on another review that said they run small I ordered size 10 for my usual 9 1/2 size. I think I could have easily been comfortable in the 9 because I added a thick insole and still have plenty of room for fleece liners.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very like it. The only drawback is to wait too ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very like it.The only drawback is to wait too long ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I'm an 8 and half shoe. These do not come in a half sizes so I ordered a 9. Fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed up!?
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when these arrived, however upon opening the box they looked scuffed up. I tried to wipe it off, but it's definitely marks on the boots, not dust, etc... I asked amazon to send me another pair, which amazingly they overnighted, but unfortunately the 2nd pair looked the same. I wish I could talk myself into believing this is just how they're supposed to look, but even if that's the case, it's just not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tobian

customer_reviews.title: Who wore these? Wish it was me!
customer_reviews.text: Damaged right boot- appears very worn- such a shame as they are so darn cute. May reorder in alternate color, the blue looks a bit tired, don't need that on a rainy day :) Fit consistent with other reviews, expectantly roomy, save for the calf area. However, this is likely due to my height at 5'1"- the normal calf area is higher up on the boot for someone of average height, but it works nonetheless. The top girth can be moderately controlled with the buckle to your aesthetic or functional preference. The height was acceptable even for a petite girl- it fell comfortably just under my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Czechmate

customer_reviews.title: These boots are fantastic and beautiful but they run BIG
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic and beautiful but they run BIG.. I usually wear between a 9-10... So I ordered a 10 so I could wear insulated socks with them.. Even with boot liners and thick socks they are still big...
customer_reviews.author: kweeks78

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased boots and after 3 months of use the buckle broke. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny V.

product_meta.title: Joules Women's Field Welly Rain Boot
product_meta.description: The uppers are made from 100 rubber which makes them 100 waterproof and also flexible, ideal for muddy walks or splashing in puddles. Inside is a textile lining to help your feet slide in and out whilst the slightly cushioned insole adds comfort for all day wear. Completed with a sturdy rubber outsole for durability.
feature_bullets: Printed rain boot featuring logoed shaft and expanding inset with adjustable buckle strap

The boots might have white wax film may appear on the surface of the rubber boots and that it can be wiped off with a damp cloth. This "blooming" effect is not a defect. Blooming is caused when the boots are exposed to extreme temperatures or temperature swings and the wax helps prevent the rubber from weathering.
